title: Historical Revenue Growth Trends of Anterix Inc

content.text: Here is the historical revenue growth data for Anterix Inc:

Based on the revenue growth trends of Anterix Inc, here are some implications for investors:
1. Steady Growth: The company has shown consistent revenue growth over the years, indicating a stable and potentially profitable business.
2. Market Opportunities: The increasing revenue suggests that Anterix Inc has been able to tap into new market opportunities and expand its customer base.
3. Positive Outlook: The upward trajectory of revenue may indicate that the company's products or services are in high demand, which can lead to increased profitability and potential stock price growth.
4. Risk Assessment: Investors should also consider other factors such as expenses, competition, and industry trends to assess the overall financial health and sustainability of Anterix Inc's revenue growth.

news.headline: ANTERIX TO RELEASE FOURTH-QUARTER EARNINGS FOR FISCAL 2024, HOLD ANALYST AND INVESTOR CALL
news.summary: Anterix (NASDAQ: ATEX) announced today that it will release its fiscal 2024 fourth quarter financial results and file its 10-K for the year ended March 31, 2024, after the close of the market on Wednesday, June 26, 2024.

news.headline: Anterix Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Fiscal Year 2024 Results
news.summary: Anterix (NASDAQ: ATEX) today announced its fiscal 2024 fourth quarter and full fiscal year financial results and filed its 10-K for the year ended March 31, 2024. The Company also issued an update on its Demonstrated Intent metric which can be found on Anterix's website at http://www.investors.anterix.com/Q42024.

news.headline: ONCOR JOINS THE 900 MHz PRIVATE WIRELESS NETWORKS MOVEMENT WITH ANTERIX SPECTRUM AGREEMENT
news.summary: Anterix (NASDAQ: ATEX) announced today that it has entered into an agreement with Oncor Electric Delivery Company LLC ("Oncor") under which Oncor will acquire 900 MHz broadband spectrum from Anterix necessary to deploy a private wireless broadband network throughout its service territory.
